job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a seasoned expert in Azure Cloud services with a robust understanding of DevOps tools such as IAC, Containers, and CI/CD? Do you thrive in leading projects and imparting your knowledge to both colleagues and clients? If so, EPAM Netherlands offers you a magnificent opportunity to be part of our team of Cloud Engineers.
   At EPAM, we're looking for a Lead Azure Systems Engineer to work collaboratively on client projects across diverse verticals including FinTech, Big Tech, Life Sciences, Media and Entertainment, among others. This role invites you to contribute significantly to our projects while continually enhancing your expertise through our comprehensive learning ecosystem., * Demonstrate a proactive mindset and a strong desire to learn and explore new technologies, including GenAI, LLM and Copilots
     * Lead the implementation and management of Azure cloud services with a focus on Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
     * Develop and maintain continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using tools such as Azure DevOps, GitHub or GitLab
     * Write and maintain high-quality, reusable code and manage configurations through scripting languages such as Python, Bash or PowerShell
     * Configure, monitor and maintain cost-effective, scalable and resilient Microsoft Azure solutions
     * Ensure compliance with client security, quality, scalability, resiliency and regulatory standards
     * Create clear, comprehensive technical support documentation, reusable assets and guidance materials
     * Provide technical direction for DevOps initiatives across different solution groups and third-party vendors
     * Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and resolve issues
job_details.full_text:
Lead Azure Systems Engineer

Are you a seasoned expert in Azure Cloud services with a robust understanding of DevOps tools such as IAC, Containers, and CI/CD? Do you thrive in leading projects and imparting your knowledge to both colleagues and clients? If so, EPAM Netherlands offers you a magnificent opportunity to be part of our team of Cloud Engineers.
   At EPAM, we're looking for a Lead Azure Systems Engineer to work collaboratively on client projects across diverse verticals including FinTech, Big Tech, Life Sciences, Media and Entertainment, among others. This role invites you to contribute significantly to our projects while continually enhancing your expertise through our comprehensive learning ecosystem., * Demonstrate a proactive mindset and a strong desire to learn and explore new technologies, including GenAI, LLM and Copilots
     * Lead the implementation and management of Azure cloud services with a focus on Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
     * Develop and maintain continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using tools such as Azure DevOps, GitHub or GitLab
     * Write and maintain high-quality, reusable code and manage configurations through scripting languages such as Python, Bash or PowerShell
     * Configure, monitor and maintain cost-effective, scalable and resilient Microsoft Azure solutions
     * Ensure compliance with client security, quality, scalability, resiliency and regulatory standards
     * Create clear, comprehensive technical support documentation, reusable assets and guidance materials
     * Provide technical direction for DevOps initiatives across different solution groups and third-party vendors
     * Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and resolve issues

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes Azure Systems Engineering and DevOps practices, with only a minor mention of GenAI/LLM as an area for exploration. The core responsibilities and technologies align with traditional cloud infrastructure and MLOps rather than specialized GenAI development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'client projects across diverse verticals including FinTech, Big Tech, Life Sciences, Media and Entertainment' indicates an understanding of different business contexts.

The phrase 'Write and maintain high-quality, reusable code and manage configurations through scripting languages such as Python, Bash or PowerShell' directly relates to software development practices.

The phrases 'robust understanding of DevOps tools such as IAC, Containers, and CI/CD', 'Develop and maintain continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using tools such as Azure DevOps, GitHub or GitLab', and 'Provide technical direction for DevOps initiatives' are all core to Operations Engineering and MLOps.

soft_skills.skill: Demonstrate a proactive mindset and a strong desire to learn and explore new technologies
Lead the implementation and management of Azure cloud services
imparting your knowledge to both colleagues and clients
Provide technical direction for DevOps initiatives
